title: Greg Van Avermaet, Ashleigh Moolman Pasio, and the future of virtual cycling
description: After the spread of COVID-19, Olympic champion and Virtual Tour of Flanders winner Greg Van Avermaet thinks top-level indoor cycling is here to stay. As elite sport returns, we ask how the coronavirus pandemic has changed competition. We speak to two-time Olympian Ashleigh Moolman Pasio about the unexpected benefits to women's cycling. Plus, tech guru Wim Sweldens gives his reasons why the indoors will never replace the outdoors.
